feed.title: AList Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.31.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Add feijipan driver  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5856 (555ef)
  • Add quqi driver (#5899 close #5251)  -  by @EchoResponse and @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5899 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5251 (442c2)
  • Add docker image with pre-installed ffmpeg  -  by @Mmx233 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6054 (0c7e4)
  • Support customize dsn for mysql and pg  -  by @Mars160 and @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6031 (1f835)
  • 115: Add QR code source selection  -  by @SheltonZhu in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5891 (e3e79)
  • dropbox: Add root_namespace_id to access teams folder  -  by @shouko in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5929 (aef95)
  • local: Allow specifying the recycle bin path  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5832 (34b73)
  • quqi: Add download link with cdn  -  by @EchoResponse in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5938 (92225)
  • search: Search with meilisearch  -  by @r27153733 and @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6060 (f1979)
  • sftp: Allow ignore symlink error  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6026 (47f4b)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Missing salt of guest user  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5737 (ce06f)
  • S3 upload exceeded total allowed configured MaxUploadParts  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5909 (0f29a)
  • Set progress to 100 when it's NaN  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5906 (4f776)
  • Error on repeated reading static  -  by @jing332 and @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5957 (c8286)
  • Embed all files of dist  -  by @xhofe (da5e3)
  • WebDAV's creation date should use RFC3339 format (#6015 close #5878)  -  by @ArcticLampyrid in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6015 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5878 (e49fd)
  • Don't push docker on pr due to security  -  by @xhofe (74233)
  • 123:
  • User-Agent and rate limit  -  by @123pan-com and È£é‰ø°Â≠ê in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6012 (6d85f)
  • chaoxing:
  • JSON parsing error in content field  -  by @SoY0ung in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5877 (f0e8c)
  • deps:
  • Update module github.com/aliyun/aliyun-oss-go-sdk to v3  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5800 (43489)
  • Update module github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go to v1.49.18  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5848 (1381e)
  • Update golang.org/x/exp digest to 0dcbfd6  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5862 (85fe6)
  • Update module golang.org/x/crypto to v0.18.0  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5863 (4930f)
  • Update module golang.org/x/oauth2 to v0.16.0  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5865 (86b35)
  • Update module github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go to v1.50.24  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5873 (e66ab)
  • feijipan:
  • Incorrect address of download link  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5859 (292bb)
  • google_photo:
  • Add support for streaming video, range requests  -  by @Xiefengshang in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5905 (8bccb)
  • ldap:
  • exiting by peer exception occurred during the TLS connection  -  by @rayiins in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5977 (9bd3c)
  • mopan:
  • Client version is too low  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5987 (812f5)
  • quqi:
  • File extension duplication when rename and some missing form parameters  -  by @EchoResponse and @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5910 (a8c90)
  • Error on uploading an existing file  -  by @EchoResponse in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5920 (85a28)
  • Empty file link for non vip user  -  by @EchoResponse and @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5926 (d88b5)
  • search:
  • Duplicate folder on autoupdate (#6063 close #6062)  -  by @r27153733 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6063 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6062 (53926)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.32.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • S3 server support (#6088 close #5186)  -  by @itsHenry35 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6088 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5186 (d0f88)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Support for Microsoft WebDAV (#6133 close #6104)  -  by @wolfsilver in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6133 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6104 (f8b1f)
  • Remove default polyfill (#6130 close #6100)  -  by @SukkaW and @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6130 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6100 (ae698)
  • chaoxing: Json cannot unmarshal content.uploadDate (close #6119 in #6124)  -  by @zyxkad in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6119 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6124 (71e4e)
  • feiji: Unable to get link  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6082 (94a80)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.33.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Stand-alone port s3 server  -  by @itsHenry35 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6242 (9c84b)
  • Add doge driver  -  by @eryajf and @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6201 (cf08a)
  • 139: Refresh token periodically  -  by @zzc10086 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6146 (195c8)
  • seafile: Improve features, support access to encrypted library, etc  -  by @mlkt in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6160 (ac680)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Add m3u8 to default video types  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6142 (7d9ec)
  • Settings reset to default after restart if set to empty  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6143 (2a17d)
  • Webauthn logspam  -  by @itsHenry35 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6181 (bdfc1)
  • 139:
  • Incorrect refreshTokenResp serialization  -  by @zzc10086 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6248 (022e0)
  • ci:
  • Replace dockerfile tag step may have no effect  -  by @Mmx233 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6206 (b07dd)
  • deps:
  • Update github.com/t3rm1n4l/go-mega digest to d494b6a  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6081 (6f6a8)
  • Update golang.org/x/exp digest to 814bf88  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6144 (82222)
  • ilanzou:
  • Add referer to request header  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6171 (9a0a6)
  • ipfs:
  • Url escape filename (#6245 close #6027)  -  by @chenjia404 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6245 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6027 (88947)
  • mopan:
  • Upload error (close #6158 in #6166)  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6158 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6166 (45e00)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.34.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • 123_share: Add access token  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6357 (32dda)
  • 189pc: Add family transfer upload  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6288 (d8e19)
  • Seafile: Add token login (#6324 close #5302)  -  by @tukipona in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6324 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5302 (c3c51)
  • crypt: Force stream upload for supported drivers  -  by @NewbieOrange in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6270 (e3746)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Some typos  -  by @testwill in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6283 (2880e)
  • Typo about env of Meilisearch  -  by @mnixry in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6316 (cd5a8)
  • Init storages in order  -  by @0daysseus in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6346 (0c9dc)
  • 115:
  • Disable NoOverwriteUpload (#6409 close #6251)  -  by @SheltonZhu in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6409 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6251 (b704b)
  • authn:
  • Subfolder api is considered as a wrong origin(closes #6294 in #6301)  -  by @itsHenry35 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6294 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6301 (17560)
  • baidu:
  • Custom upload part size  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5757 (4cbbd)
  • baidu_netdisk:
  • Cached Ctime/Mtime (#6373 close #6370)  -  by @potoo0 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6373 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6370 (ec08e)
  • cloudreve:
  • Add domain to the download url if not exists (#6339 close #6265)  -  by @tukipona in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6339 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6265 (793a4)
  • doge:
  • The temporary access key is only valid for two hours  -  by @eryajf and @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6273 (8a18f)
  • Reget client after refresh session  -  by @eryajf in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6277 (0e860)
  • onedrive:
  • Fix Ctime/Mtime  -  by @potoo0 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6397 (eecea)
  • s3:
  • Don't bind s3 port if s3 is not enabled  -  by @itsHenry35 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6291 (58c3c)
  • webdav:
  • Make sure Mtime after Ctime (#6372 close #6371)  -  by @potoo0 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6372 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6371 (479fc)

   üèé Performance

  • Use io copy with buffer pool  -  by @Mmx233 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6389 (b95df)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.35.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Add supports for netease music driver (#6423 close #5364)  -  by @liuycy in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6423 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/5364 (f261e)
  • Add supports for thunderX driver  -  by @Three-taile-dragon in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6464 (bbe3d)
  • Add proxy_range option for 139Yun Alias AList V3  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6496 (5f60b)
  • Add support for lark driver  -  by @wintbiit and @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6475 (85d74)
  • alias: Support Rename and Remove  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6478 (03785)
  • alist_v3: Optional pass UA to upstream remote  -  by @Sakura-Byte in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6443 (78a96)
  • mega: Add 2FA support  -  by @Kuingsmile in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6473 (9eec8)
  • s3: Server support generated url request  -  by @itsHenry35 in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6431 (7e7b9)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Pikpak captcha_required  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6497 (7013d)
  • Add lark to windows target  -  by @xhofe (d781f)
  • 189pc: FamilyID range overflow (#6427 close #6426)  -  by @meozky in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6427 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6426 (23132)
  • baidu: Unknown type for custom upload part size  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6435 (8bf93)
  • ilanzou: Upgrade devVersion  -  by @xhofe (8e2b9)
  • mopan: Upgrade version  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6500 (0a8d7)
  • sftp: Reconnect to server when connection was broken (#6416 close #6403)  -  by @okcy1016 and George Chen in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6416 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6403 (b57af)
  • test: Ensure setupStorages is executed once  -  by @Moraxyc in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6422 (5f285)
    View changes on GitHub
